pr_title: [homematic] Checking of full datapoint name is necessary

timeline.message:
Test of address only was not sufficient.

Only the string value contains the complete name that is necessary for
the check.

Additional fix for #5048


Signed-off-by: Martin Herbst <develop@mherbst.de>

timeline.author: Hilbrand

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the hint. It's definitely better. No idea how I could have missed the enum :-) . Changed it and added another small commit to the same method.
replies.author: MHerbst

timeline.message:
Using enum is better than string search


Signed-off-by: Martin Herbst <develop@mherbst.de>

according to:
